title: Top 10: the best Barcelona hotels with rooftop pools
text:
Top 10: the best Barcelona hotels with rooftop pools The roof-top infinity pool steals the show at the Art Deco-inspired Grand Hotel Central. Sally Davies , Destination expert 22 February 2017 • 4:09pm 
A n insider's guide to the best hotels with rooftop pools in Barcelona, featuring the top places to stay for poolside restaurants and cocktail bars, stunning vistas and party vibes, in locations close to the beach, Port Vells and La Rambla. Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain 8 Telegraph expert rating Sandwiched between a pedestrianised medieval street and the port, the Duquesa is well positioned for beach lovers as well as sightseers, but the hotel's crowning glory is undoubtedly the rooftop terrace, with its navy blue-tiled plunge pool, cocktail bar and restaurant overlooking the yachts of the Port Vell. The rooms have the feel of a much more expensive hotel, as does the level of service, which is five-star all the way. Read expert review From £ 93 per night
